titles.title: Air Traffic Noise and Pollution Expert Consensus Act of 2022
Air Traffic Noise and Pollution Expert Consensus Act of 2022

A bill to direct the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to enter into appropriate arrangements with the Health and Medicine Division of the National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine to provide for a report on the health impacts of air traffic noise and pollution, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Air Traffic Noise and Pollution Expert Consensus Act of 2022
This bill requires the Federal Aviation Administration to enter into an arrangement with the National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine to examine and report on the various health impacts of air traffic noise and pollution.
